Title: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting')
Description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') in neos/neos.
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 3.3 before 5.3.10, all versions starting from 7.0.0 before 7.0.9, all versions starting from 7.1.0 before 7.1.7, all versions starting from 7.2.0 before 7.2.6, all versions starting from 7.3.0 before 7.3.4, all versions starting from 8.0.0 before 8.0.2
NotImpacted: All versions before 3.3, all versions starting from 5.3.10 before 7.0.0, all versions starting from 7.0.9 before 7.1.0, all versions starting from 7.1.7 before 7.2.0, all versions starting from 7.2.6 before 7.3.0, all versions starting from 7.3.4 before 8.0.0, all versions starting from 8.0.2
